name: RetrieveAuditLogs
description:
Retrieve audit logs based on specified filters.

Use this tool to obtain audit logs from HubSpot CMS, filtered according to specific criteria. This is useful for tracking changes, monitoring activity, or performing security audits.

parameters.name: user_ids_to_filter
parameters.description: Array of user IDs to filter the audit logs by. Provide as a list of strings.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of user ids to filter by.

parameters.name: event_types
parameters.description: A list of event types to filter by, such as CREATED, UPDATED, PUBLISHED, DELETED, UNPUBLISHED.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of event types to filter by (CREATED, UPDATED, PUBLISHED, DELETED, UNPUBLISHED).

parameters.name: filter_by_object_type
parameters.description: List the object types to filter audit logs by, such as BLOG, LANDING_PAGE, DOMAIN, etc. Use a comma-separated format.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of object types to filter by (BLOG, LANDING_PAGE, DOMAIN, HUBDB_TABLE etc.)

parameters.name: filter_by_object_ids
parameters.description: List of object IDs to filter the audit logs by.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of object ids to filter by.

parameters.name: timestamp_after
parameters.description: Timestamp (in ISO 8601 format) after which audit logs will be returned.

value_schema.description: Timestamp after which audit logs will be returned

parameters.name: timestamp_before
parameters.description: A timestamp to filter audit logs before the specified date and time.

value_schema.description: Timestamp before which audit logs will be returned

parameters.name: number_of_logs_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies the number of audit logs to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The number of logs to return.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specify the sort direction for audit logs by timestamp, e.g., 'asc' or 'desc'.

value_schema.description: The sort direction for the audit logs. (Can only sort by timestamp).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Comma separated list of user ids to filter by.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of user ids to filter by.

parameters.description: Comma separated list of event types to filter by (CREATED, UPDATED, PUBLISHED, DELETED, UNPUBLISHED).

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of event types to filter by (CREATED, UPDATED, PUBLISHED, DELETED, UNPUBLISHED).

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: Comma separated list of object types to filter by (BLOG, LANDING_PAGE, DOMAIN, HUBDB_TABLE etc.)

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of object types to filter by (BLOG, LANDING_PAGE, DOMAIN, HUBDB_TABLE etc.)

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Comma separated list of object ids to filter by.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of object ids to filter by.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Timestamp after which audit logs will be returned

value_schema.description: Timestamp after which audit logs will be returned

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Timestamp before which audit logs will be returned

value_schema.description: Timestamp before which audit logs will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of logs to return.

value_schema.description: The number of logs to return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort direction for the audit logs. (Can only sort by timestamp).

value_schema.description: The sort direction for the audit logs. (Can only sort by timestamp).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
